'''Finn Jones''' (born 24 March 1988) is an English actor. He is best known for the recurring role of Jamie in the successful British soap opera ''[[wikipedia:Hollyoaks|Hollyoaks]]'' and its spin-off, ''[[wikipedia:Hollyoaks Later|Hollyoaks Later]]''. He has also appeared in ''[[wikipedia:Doctors (2000 TV series)|Doctors]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:The Bill|The Bill]]''. More recently, he has appeared as "Santiago Jones" in a two-part episode of ''[[wikipedia:Doctor Who|Doctor Who]]'' spin-off ''[[wikipedia:The Sarah-Jane Adventures|The Sarah-Jane Adventures]]'', in the episode titled ''Death of the Doctor'' which is one of two episodes to feature the Doctor and the only featuring Matt Smith, the eleventh Doctor.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' Jones is playing Ser [[Loras Tyrell]]. He confirmed via Twitter that he had gotten the role on 19 June 2010. He initially appeared as a guest star in the [[Season 1|first season]] and returned in this role for the [[Season 2|second season]].
[[File:Finn jones gay times cover.jpg|thumb|150px|left|Finn Jones gracing the cover of ''Gay Times'', February 2013 cover]]
In the February 2013 issue of ''Gay Times'' magazine, Jones commented on playing a homosexual character: "In terms of the gay community, Iâ€™ve got a very strong reaction that people are happy with it, happy that gay characters are being portrayed but not in a sensationalized or stereotyped way, and theyâ€™re being put into a world that is a very masculine, hard world. I hope that they think that weâ€™re not stereotyping them."<ref>[http://www.justjared.com/2013/01/01/game-of-thrones-finn-jones-shirtless-speedo-for-gay-times/ JustJared.com], January 2013</ref>

Finn is a big fan of the swords-and-sorcery medieval fantasy cartoon ''Adventure Time'', created by Pendelton Ward, which airs on Cartoon Network.<ref>[http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=VmCK3oigRLk Finn Jones FlicksAndTheCity Interview], February 2013</ref>
